TopicTitle: Where to start for a new Plugin.

Articles.Content:
Hello , i started playing KSP about a week ago , this day's i placed some probes on almost same orbital period , but it is almost impossible to make a perfect sync ( game engine decimal rounding at some point , etc ... ) , so i will need to adjust them a bit after a time. Now this adjustment need to be done according to the orbital periods , and distance between two probes , on short some math done on paper.

I have exp whit C++,C#,dll, etc .... so i was thinking to give it a try and make an in-game calculator plugin ( active vessel + target vessel , press a button and it will calculate the things what i am doing now on paper).

Now, is there any webpage where it is explaind how this plugin works , and some tutorial how to make your first plugin and stuff ?

Thx.
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25013 is a great resource. Check out the stuff under the "Plugins" section.
